oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1957-07-06 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 2 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from July 6, 1957. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Roy Acuff (host/performer) and his Smoky Mountain Boys and Girls, guest performer Jimmy C. Newman, and regular performers Rod Brasfield, Howdy Forrester, Pap's Jug Band, June Carter, and Bashful Brother Oswald. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN. It is announced that this is the 926th broadcast.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: June Carter; Jimmy C. Newman; Bashful Brother Oswald; Roy Acuff; Smoky Mountain Boys
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Roy Acuff introduces June Carter -- Comedy routine (June Carter, Roy Acuff) -- Prince Albert commercial (Jimmy C. Newman, Roy Acuff) -- Prince Albert jingle -- Roy Acuff introduces Jimmy Newman -- I Can't Go On This Way (Jimmy C. Newman) -- Roy Acuff introduces Bashful Brother Oswald -- Southern Moon (Bashful Brother Oswald) -- Roy Acuff talks -- Fraulein (Roy Acuff and the Smoky Mountain Boys and Girls) -- Closing theme -- Closing statement (Roy Acuff) -- Camel Cigarettes commercial -- Station announcements
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; United States. Armed Forces Radio Service; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); Turner, Grant; Brasfield, Rod; Cash, June Carter, 1929-2003; Forrester, Howdy, 1922-1987; Pap's Jug Band; Bashful Brother Oswald; Johnson, Jerry (Bassist); Acuff, Roy; Smoky Mountain Boys; Newman, Jimmy C.
